original_text: The priest will take the other bird and the wood from the cedar tree. He will take the red wool and the hyssop. He will put all of them into the blood of the dead bird. He will shake the blood and water over the house seven times. This will make the house clean.
korean_text: 백향목과 우슬초와 홍색 실과 살아 있는 새를 가져다가 잡은 새의 피와 흐르는 물을 찍어 그 집에 일곱 번 뿌릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: The priest will take the other bird
and the wood from the cedar tree
He will take the red wool
He will put all of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 모든 것을 넣을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: into the blood of the dead bird
sentences.korean_translation: 죽은 새의 피 속에 넣을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will shake the blood and water

sentences.korean_translation: 집 위로 일곱 번 뿌릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: This will make the house clean
